channel.title: Jumpserver on mvpbang
channel.description: Recent content in Jumpserver on mvpbang

item.title: jumpserver always wait
item.description:
docker ps
5d34edfc8832 jumpserver/jms_all:v2.7.1 "./entrypoint.sh" 41 minutes ago Up 21 minutes 0.0.0.0:80->80/tcp, 0.0.0.0:2222->2222/tcp jms_all

批量执行命令，显示等待中，没有回显，看日志是执行成功的，根据issues是redis版本的问题，升级到6.x就可以解决
  • https://github.com/jumpserver/jumpserver/issues/5048
